revised_title: A Yearly Analysis of Weather and Agricultural Conditions in Lyndon, Rutland, and Surrounding Areas in 1791
tldr: This article presents a detailed analysis of weather and agricultural conditions in Lyndon, Rutland, and surrounding areas in 1791. The author, Thomas Barker, records the barometer and thermometer readings, as well as the rainfall, throughout the year. The text also discusses the differences in weather patterns in various regions of England and their impact on agriculture and crop yields.
